programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Charge S22 Ep05
programme.desc: Chase terjatuh di bawah jampi raksasa Sledge apabila seorang penilik nasib Maori meminta pertolongan untuk menjaga kedainya daripada perompak

programme.title: Ultraman Z Ep11
programme.desc: Haruki Natsukawan ialah seorang juruterbang di unit robot Global Allied Forces Japan 'STORAGE'. Semasa Haruki bekerja untuk menjaga keamanan di Bumi, seorang Ultra Hero muncul iaitu Ultraman Z. Z

programme.title: Bola Kampung Xtreme Ep05
programme.desc: Kisah ini tentang sekumpulan budak di Kampung Gong Lechar yang minat terhadap bola sepak sehingga pengetua sekolah Encik Daud dan jurulatih Encik Abdul Rahman membuat keputusan.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep15
programme.desc: Rakan-rakan Gingka pergi ke kampung Gingka untuk mencarinya tetapi berhadapan dengan cabaran semasa perjalanan termasuklah seorang pengembara misteri Hyoma

programme.title: Tsurupika Hagemaru Ep36
programme.desc: Hagemaru merupakan anak tunggal keluarga Hageta yang kedekut dan sering mencari jalan untuk berjimat-cermat dalam pembelanjaan.

programme.title: New Doraemon Ep136
programme.desc: Siri terbaharu Doraemon, sebuah kucing robot bersama Nobita serta rakan-rakannya dalam menjalani kehidupan harian yang penuh aksi yang melucukan.

programme.title: SMK Ep01
programme.desc: Adam masuk sekolah baharu dan mencari kawan baharu tidak semudah yang disangkakan. Akhirnya dia berkawan dengan Mal tapi menyedari Mal mempergunakannya untuk mengelak dimarahi cikgu lalu bertengkar.

programme.title: Family Spy Ep01
programme.desc: Roz telah pencen dari dunia perisikan dan hidup aman bersama keluarganya. Cucunya Rin menggodam satu program simulasi lalu dihubungi pemanggil misteri, dan Rin hilang dari rumah. Adakah Rin diculik?

programme.title: Kampung Boy S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Nikmati animasi terbaik hasil nukilan Dato' Lat yang penuh kreatif lagi menghiburkan ini istimewa untuk tontonan anda sekeluarga!

programme.title: Dee The Series Ep08
programme.desc: Dee, bersama ibunya, Amy dan adiknya Mia memulakan hidup baru di Kuala Lumpur apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia yang baru untuk Dee di kolej itu.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero The Chronicles HD Ep23
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero iaitu anak legenda Ultraseven menerima latihan daripada Ultraman Leo untuk menjadi pejuang yang berkelayakan. Apabila tanah airnya, Land of Light diancam oleh sekumpulan raksasa

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep07
programme.desc: Benkei melatih Kenta untuk menghadapi Hikaru; Madoka memberikan Kenta sebahagian bey untuk mencipta sebuah gerakan istimewa baru demi menewaskan Hikaru.

programme.title: Dah Mati Pun Cantik
programme.desc: Mayat seorang wanita yang kekal cantik menimbulkan seribu tanda tanya kepada dua koroner di sebuah bilik bedah siasat.

programme.title: 2 Miles Below
programme.desc: Sembilan pelombong Appalachian berjuang untuk terus hidup setelah letupan metana hanya meninggalkan oksigen untuk mereka bertahan dalam masa satu jam.

programme.title: Senario Ops Pocot
programme.desc: Pelbagai kejadian lucu ditempuhi oleh 3 pemuda yang mendaftarkan diri di kem RELA untuk mengubah hidup mereka. Lakonan Azli, Wahid & Mazlan.

programme.title: Karya 12-Pangkalan Batu 6
programme.desc: Kisah cinta singkat antara Mimi dan Li Sepila yang bertemu di sebuah pangkalan bertukar menjadi tragedi apabila identiti sebenar mereka mula terbongkar...

programme.title: Surga Yang Terluka
programme.desc: Aji adalah anak penjual sayur jalanan. Dia adalah anak yang baik dan taat kepada ibunya. Namun dia mula berubah sikap selepas mengenali teman wanita semasa di Kolej.

programme.title: Karya 12-Lampu Merah
programme.desc: Si lelaki sukakan si perempuan, tanpa sedar yang si perempuan itu psiko dan obses dengan cintanya. Cara untuk selamatkan diri hanya dengan jatuh cinta dengan si perempuan semula.

programme.title: Lesen Besar
programme.desc: Tiga sekawan yang rindu zaman bujang mereka telah merancang untuk pergi 'road trip' setelah mendapat pelepasan daripada isteri dan teman wanita masing-masing. Tapi nasib tidak menyebelahi mereka di sepanja

programme.title: Special Clip i-Tanggang Ep06
programme.desc: Special Clip episod 7. Saksikan drama bersiri i-Tanggang setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra 108.

programme.title: My Future Husband
programme.desc: Emily berharap untuk menemui bakal suami dan pada suatu hari muncul seorang lelaki bernama Atta yang mengaku dia adalah suami Emily dari masa hadapan.

programme.title: Trailer HatiYangDikhianati Kembali Ep01
programme.desc: Saksikan drama bersiri Hati Yang Dikhianati yang akan kembali menemui anda semula bermula 22 Oktober 2021, Jam 6 Petang hanya di Astro Prima Saluran 105.

programme.title: My Stupid Boss (for Citra)
programme.desc: Diana berpindah ke Kuala Lumpur mengikut suaminya yang bekerja di sana. Dia kemudiannya diterima bekerja di sebuah syarikat milik Bossman. Mampukah dia bertahan dengan sikap majikannya itu?

programme.title: Aksi Kucing
programme.desc: Filem komedi klasik mengenai seorang suami yang miang cuba untuk memikat seorang wanita yang bekerja di sebuah kelab malam.Lakonan Allahyarham Dato' Aziz Satar dan Zaiton.

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Janin
programme.desc: Erma dan Razak merupakan doktor yang menjalankan kegiatan pengguguran haram di klinik mereka. Disamping itu, janin yang digugurkan itu dijadikan makanan kecantikan dan dijual kepada pelanggan kaya.

programme.title: Special Clip i-Tanggang Ep06
programme.desc: Special Clip episod 7. Saksikan drama bersiri i-Tanggang setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra 108.

programme.title: Dolla
programme.desc: Sabrina, Tabby, Angel dan Sasha ingin mencapai cita-cita dan minat mereka dalam bidang Muzik. Namun, mereka terpaksa mengharungi dugaan demi untuk mencapai impian mereka.

programme.title: i-Tanggang Ep06
programme.desc: Dr Nini syak Erma menghidapi Munchausen Syndrome by Proxy. Khalil terjumpa garam & juga fail-fail hospital yang mencurigakan. Syafiq dan Esra terkejut apabila melihat Khalil boleh berjalan.

programme.title: Cucu Nek Putih
programme.desc: Kisah seorang nenek yang harus menurunkan ilmu sihir kepada cucunya. Setelah mewarisi ilmu dari neneknya, Suri kelihatan seperti wanita gila dan penduduk kampung mula bercakap tentangnya.

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: Courtney Collins bersama kedua anaknya Dylan dan Zach telah berpindah ke sebuah rumah di luar bandar. Kisah bermula apabila Dylan dan Zach mampu melihat kejadian yang pernah terjadi di rumah tersebut.

programme.title: Kifarah Buta
programme.desc: Minat Zahid terhadap muzik telah membawanya kepada Suraya, seorang gadis yang menjadi mangsa ketamakkan abangnya Kamal.

programme.title: Sneak Peek i-Tanggang Ep18
programme.desc: Sneak Peek episod 7. Saksikan 'i-Tanggang' setiap Isnin pukul 9 malam di Astro Citra saluran 108.

programme.title: Anais Patah Hati Pertama Kali
programme.desc: Anais, seorang chef membuat pastri berusia 30-an, putus cinta untuk pertama kalinya dalam hidup, dan menghadapi masalah untuk mengawal emosinya.

programme.title: Peraturan
programme.desc: Seorang pembunuh bersiri memilih mangsa berdasarkan kesalahan trafik. Seorang anggota polis cuba untuk menghalang dan membongkar motif di sebalik segalanya.

programme.title: Remp-It
programme.desc: Filem penuh aksi tentang kehidupan sekumpulan pelumba motorsikal haram di Kuala Lumpur. Dibintangi oleh Farid Kamil, Firdee Aqasha, Zulhuzaimy Marzuki, Julia Hana dan Cat Farish.

programme.desc: Special Clip episod 7. Saksikan drama bersiri i-Tanggang setiap Isnin, 9 malam di saluran Astro Citra 108.

programme.title: Sepenggal Puisi Ep01
programme.desc: Rahsia yang di simpan selama 30 tahun akhirnya terbongkar dan menimbulkan konflik dalam 2 buah keluarga yang berada di Kuala Lumpur dan juga Yogyakarta.

programme.title: Lagenda Budak Setan

programme.title: Deadly Contract
programme.desc: Yan Jian, jurutera IT dari China memasuki pertandingan di Afrika untuk memenangi hak mengawal sisten komunikasi antara Barat dan Timur. Yan mendapati wujudnya konspirasi dalam pertandingan tersebut.

programme.title: Rock

programme.title: Penanggal
programme.desc: Kisah Murni yang secara tidak sengaja mewarisi ilmu penanggal daripada Mak Ajeng dan terpaksa pula melarikan diri ke Kampung Jawa demi perlindungannya. Lakonan Fasha Sandha, Ummi Nazeera, Azri Iskandar dan Zul Ariffin. Arahan Ellie Suriaty Omar.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: Guaranteed to sweep the audience off their feet, this battle between a usurper of the throne and patriots led by Wu Wen-yuan climaxes in an eventful ending!

programme.title: Disciples of Shaolin
programme.desc: One of Chang Cheh's finest films, this saga stars Alexander Fu Sheng in his greatest martial arts role as a penniless country boy who fights his way to riches.

programme.title: Killers on Wheels
programme.desc: While taking a ferry on the way to a vacation, Kwok and his family meet a road thug who puts an ugly spin on their holiday plans.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Featuring the unforgettable song Country Road, Shaw's Huangmei Opera stars Ivy Ling Po and tells the tale of a poor student engaged to a billionaire's daughter.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Set in Seoul right after the Korean War, a kung-fu master, combat instructor, explosives expert and missiles specialist take on a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A righteous man who can't fight and an unjustly wronged swordsman team up to battle against evil.

programme.title: Lady of Steel
programme.desc: Kung fu queen Cheng Pei-pei plays a swordswoman on a mission to find the bandits who killed her parents and save her country from foreign invaders.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: Regular Joes turn heroes to save their neighbourhood, when a local mobster decides to turn their local gossip spot into a gambling den!

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: 5 Shaolin rebels train hard in order to successfully defeat their Manchu enemies. Starring David Chiang, Ti Lung, Alexander Fu.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin loyalists (led by Alexander Fu Sheng and Chen Kuan Tai) go up against a formidable Manchu general and his Tibetan allies.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu Lan
programme.desc: A young woman joins the army in place of her old, ailing father and only when she returns home is the truth revealed.

programme.title: A Taste of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword, as the Five Tigers take this adventure to the outer limits.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin hero and the vicious Pai Mei lock horns in this kungfu revenge tale that spans two generations.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: In Wong Jing's first modern drama spiced up by three great kung fu choreographers, stars Ti Lung, Chen Hui Min, Wang Lung Wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu defy death.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh teams up with the Five Venoms in this martial arts saga that captures the fab five at their swashbuckling best.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: A drifter (David Chiang) and another swordsman (Ti Lung) are competitors for a woman's love who fate turns into brothers in arms.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: Actress Li Li Hua, star of over 60 films since 1947, beautifully portrays the disgraced wife of a peddler in the final days of the Ching Dynasty.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Lauded as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals of the 60s, this award-winning piece starring Linda Lin Dai as a dancer who finds romance with her boss's son.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: In true Huangmei opera style, lovely Li Hsiang-chun stars as a used and abused beauty in director Kao Li's restrained, as well as sadistic tearjerker.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: The Shaw Brothers' directors created this 60's classic depicting a timeless romance between a wealthy man and a songbird.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: A village boy recruits his friends to help peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: Dubbed Little Bastard due to never having known his parents, a young man seeks his roots, with help from a staunch ally called Little Beggar.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The 'iron triangle' comprising director Chang Cheh and stars David Chiang and Ti Lung produces this explosive kung fu epic.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: This sequel captures how singer Tang Qi searches through battle-scarred China for her soldier lover, Xing Ya. However, are they fated to be apart?

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: 17-year-old Wong Fei Hung is prompted to go and do battle to avenge a friend's death and protect his family honour.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: A hero (Chen Kuan Tai) battles assassins who use a deadly, beheading weapon to kill dissidents.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh joins forces with Ni Kuang and martial arts choreographer Liu Chia-liang to craft this brilliant saga from the golden age of kung fu films.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: When a detective's bullet changes direction in mid-air to zero in on its target, a terrifying supernatural connection comes to light.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Claire works for Sammy, the CEO of a cosmetics company. She has a shot at a better life when a billionaire pursues her and asks Sammy for help- without realizing her feelings for him.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: Winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards. After his beloved married his brother, Yang Feng leaves to run an isolated inn and becomes a broker for assassins.

programme.title: Viral MH000991
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, this chilling Thai tale depicts how a gamer captures a spirit photo that she shares with friends - only to release the spirit that begins to haunt them all.

programme.title: Let Me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: When a geeky teen librarian stumbles upon the secret terminal illness of his popular classmate, he slowly begins to help her achieve her bucket list. Simultaneously, she draws him out of his shell.

programme.title: Legend of Mysterious Agent
programme.desc: Female students in Baicheng are missing and killed by vampires. Exorcism trio tries to hunt them down. A Millennium vampire disguises as the warlord, only to collect the blood of missing girls.

programme.title: Three
programme.desc: Directed by Johnnie To, this action-thriller depicts how a doctor, a cop & a corned thug trigger a vicious cycle fueled by bad decisions & conflicting desires.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: While covering a smuggling case in London, TV host Ha Mui meets a thief and a washed-out detective. They have different goals but must work together to retrieve the missing artefact.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a little girl named Cherry. When her father's crime connections place her in danger, it is up to him to save her.

programme.title: Perfect Imperfection
programme.desc: Starring Ady An, Ahn Jae Hyun & Alex Fong, this drama depicts the varying perspectives of love that drive two people born under the same horoscope sign - Virgo.

programme.title: OlaBola
programme.desc: The producers of The Journey present a heartwarming tale of friendship, sporting spirit & national unity, embodied in a multicultural football team of the '80s.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: When service at the 5-star Bai Xing Hotel is not living up to its billing, tough executive Cruella Koo is sent to whip the employees into shape and inject a little glamour into the hotel.

programme.title: Phantom of the Theatre
programme.desc: Ruby Lin shines in this dark tale set in a haunted theatre, a once-grand playhouse that re-opens with a new show which awakens a forgotten tragedy.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: While using a new invention, three friends wind up trapped in the 1993 film Flirting Scholar. Upon discovering that the lead character, Tang Pak Fu, is missing, the trio devises a plan.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: A series of comical events follow when a petty thief, a roguish security guard & a potty-mouthed woman find their lives intersecting one day over a lost gun & a heist.

programme.title: Fooling Around Jiang Hu
programme.desc: A goodhearted gangleader who faces a threat from his assistant fights back the best way he knows how - by singing!

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Oscar winner Jean-Jacques Annaud pair up William Chan and Jelly Lin for their first collaboration to tell the story of Genghis Khan, who battles countless hardships en route to becoming the God of War.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars a railroad worker who leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to help the poor. Tao, Wang Kai & Darren Wang co-star in this action-comedy film.

programme.title: To Love or Not to Love
programme.desc: Casey had her heart broken by her high school boyfriend, Elton. Three years later, Casey now much choose between the perfect guy, Adam and Elton as the truth behind Elton's betrayal is revealed.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three-armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor & his assistant must put up the fight of their lives to stop them from obtaining a bullet that is a key piece of evidence.

programme.title: Love is...Pyjamas
programme.desc: As her boss struggles to save his sinking company, underwear designer Spring finds herself up against a new employee in a race to create a new fashion line.

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: Starring Gwei Lun Mei, Joseph Chang & Cheney Chen, this crime drama depicts how a young cop goes undercover to bring down a slick group of criminals specializing in mobile fraud.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: Two cops stumble upon a conspiracy in the wake of the death of a girl accused of 'stealing bullets.'Risking their own lives, they set out to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye

programme.desc: Guy Fieri challenges his talented chef friends to take a burger beyond the basic patty and bun.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: A young countryside woman and an affluent banker paralyzed in a tragic accident couldn't have less in common, but in this heartbreakingly romance, they gain understanding, and ultimately love.

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: One family is put to the test during a 12-hour period where crime is made legal and emergency services are suspended.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: An all-star athlete and accomplished debater, Luce's reputation is questioned when his teacher makes a discovery in his locker. But is he at fault, or is his teacher preying on dangerous stereotypes?

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan is spirited away to a magical land, where he finds both fun and dangers, and discovers his destiny to become the hero who will be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: Swimming for Gold
programme.desc: Claire Carpenter, a 17-year-old elite swimmer, is reluctantly sent to Australia to coach a boys' swim team after an accident that leaves her with aquaphobia.

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A superstar singer and her overworked personal assistant are presented with a choice that could alter the course of their respective careers.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: 40 years after the terrifying events at Overlook Hotel, Dan Torrance found some semblance of peace which is quickly shattered when he met a courageous teenager with a powerful extrasensory gift.

programme.title: The Outpost
programme.desc: A true story of heroism about the battle of Kamdesh in Afghanistan, where 54 soldiers were surrounded by 400 Taliban insurgents at the deadliest military outpost in the world.

programme.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
programme.desc: Artist Clare Abshire shares a deep emotional bond with Henry De Tamble, a handsome librarian who travels involuntarily through time.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Jennifer Connelly star in the true-to-life story of a brilliant mathematician. 'A Beautiful Mind'.

programme.title: Jumanji: the Next Level
programme.desc: The gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they will have to brave parts unexplored, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: A family of three fights for survival as a planet-destroying comet hurtles towards Earth. They make a perilous journey to their only hope for survival.

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: One family is put to the test during a 12-hour period where crime is made legal and emergency services are suspended.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: At a magical but remote island resort, lucky guests have their secret dreams realised. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the guests have to solve the island's mystery in order to escape.

programme.title: Walking Tall (2004)
programme.desc: Enlisting the help of his old pal, a retired soldier gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown from crime, drugs and violence.

programme.title: Aeonflux
programme.desc: Four hundred years into the future, a top assassin is sent to kill the leader of the last human bastion.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: When a successful executive suffers a crisis of confidence and his career is at stake, he finds the solution to his problems in his daughter's imaginary world.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: The gang of animals joins a travelling circus to get home to New York.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: When a threat emerges that puts Bird and Pig Islands in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chuck's sister and team up with pigs to forge an unsteady truce to save their homes.

programme.title: The Spongebob Squarepants Movie
programme.desc: Spongebob Squarepants leaves Bikini Bottom to track down King Neptune's stolen crown and save Mr. Krabs from execution.

programme.title: The Spongebob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob travels to our world to locate a burger recipe stolen by a pirate.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: At a magical but remote island resort, lucky guests have their secret dreams realised. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the guests have to solve the island's mystery in order to escape.

programme.title: Jumanji: the Next Level
programme.desc: The gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they will have to brave parts unexplored, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: A family of three fights for survival as a planet-destroying comet hurtles towards Earth. They make a perilous journey to their only hope for survival.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Hobbs assembles an elite racing team to challenge and take down a group of mercenary drivers!

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Former Special Forces soldier Roy Pulver urgently needs to figure out why he is stuck in a repeating time loop in which he is killed violently in different ways every day.

programme.title: The Invisible Man (2020)
programme.desc: After Cecilia escapes from a controlling relationship, her abusive ex-boyfriend commits suicide. She's sanity then unravels due to a series of eerie coincidences and the presence of someone nobody can see.

programme.desc: An ancient relic disappears from Carlos' dig, Tracker and Skye must find the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger fakes a toe injury to win a race so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep108
programme.desc: After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep115
programme.desc: After fixing Trevor the Turtle's broken flipper, Calvin needs to make the perfect underwater resting place for him to recover. He uses his PLAY POWER to find everything needed to finish Trevor's new home.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Calvin's adventures lead him to Fossil Valley to look for a special fossil for Kaison. But when part of the fossil rock he's excavating breaks off and traps ROBO G, Calvin has to activate his PLAY POWER!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep228
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is super fun as Zo has invited all of their friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep229
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and they paint a beautiful picture. Everything is going very well until ducks turn up and run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep230
programme.desc: Daddy Pig winds up an old cuckoo clock. When a cuckoo pops out singing 'Cuckoo!', Peppa thinks it's very funny, but George missed it. He doesn't want to miss it again but it only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep231
programme.desc: Peppa and family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but dislikes peddling uphill. When they meet Peppa's friends, they decide to have a race but she insists on racing downhill.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Hansel and Gretel have to get Bubble Puppy and Bubble Kitty home safe to the Furry Godmother, but they're being stalked by a witch along the way!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta.We identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel and Pail.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep111
programme.desc: When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that they will be hungry, so Granny Pig helps.

programme.title: Jefri Dan Karina Di Rumah Besar
programme.desc: Kisah tentang 2 kanak-kanak dan ibubapanya yang berpindah ke rumah baru sehingga pada satu malam, semasa ibubapa mereka tiada di rumah, pelbagai perkara pelik berlaku.Saksikan kesudahan drama misteri ini.
